script:
1). Wouldn't you rather have a latte?
Hmm... yeah, I think I would. 
I won't have a latte, thanks.
I could have a double mocha.
2). Whose turn is it to refill the ink?
We all take turns.
Turn it to the left.
It's Jessie's. 
3). Which picture did you take?
I'll take two, please.
A pitcher of lemonade.
The one of the mountain.
